title: The Village
marks: Signature and Date LR in red: [Albert Gleizes 13]
provenance:
Possibly Herwarth Walden, Berlin, Germany.[1] (Galerie Arnold, Dresden). F. R. Schon, Toronto, Ontario; (Herbert Tannenbaum Galleries, New York, New York). (Eugene V. Thaw & Co., New York, New York by 1971); purchased by MIA in 1971.

[1] Several labels on the reverse of the painting list various owners, including Walden, Schon, and Tannenbaum Galleries. No dates have been associated yet with these collections.
